This page documents how to reinstall Microsoft Windows without losing Ubuntu.

== Procedure ==
=== If Ubuntu is installed the standard way (outside Windows) ===

* Backup your documents on an external disk (or DVDs...)
* Reinstall Windows
* Restore GRUB (eg via <nowiki>[[Boot-Repair]]</nowiki>)

=== If Ubuntu is installed inside Windows (via the Wubi installer) ===

* Backup your documents
* Backup the wubi files (generally located in C:\ubuntu\disks\)
* Either:

- <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WubiGuide/#How_do_I_migrate_to_a_real_partition.2C_and.2BAC8-or_get_rid_of_Windows_entirely.3F|migrate Ubuntu outside Windows]]</nowiki>, then reinstall Windows, then restore GRUB (eg via <nowiki>[[Boot-Repair]]</nowiki>).

- Or reinstall Windows, then reinstall Wubi and restore the Wubi files.
